related.word: 只要功夫深，铁杵磨成针

definition: Heaven rewards the diligent. (idiom)
the matter depends on the individual (idiom); it is a matter for your own effort/With effort, one can achieve anything.
one cannot achieve glory and wealth without having been through trials and tribulations (proverb)/no pain, no gain

definition: every beginning is difficult (idiom)/getting started is always the hardest part
with familiarity you learn the trick (idiom); practice makes perfect
easy to grasp but difficult to put into practice (idiom)/easier said than done
no end to learning (idiom); There's always something new to study./You live and learn.
lit. sincerity splits open metal and metal (idiom); if you put your heart to it, you can break up metal and rocks/With a will, you can achieve anything.

definition: dripping water penetrates the stone (idiom); constant perseverance yields success/You can achieve your aim if you try hard without giving up./Persistent effort overcomes any difficulty.
